overview: Egypt is home to many of the most famous archaeological treasures on Earth, but over the last five years, Egypt has suffered a tumultuous revolution and tourist numbers have plummeted. This program follows a select cast of individuals, determined to bring Egypt back from the brink of disaster: to discover more of Egyptâ€™s history, to keep its heritage safe and to get tourists to visit the country again.
title: Egypt's Treasure Guardians
